title: In GSK's trial of shingles vaccine in China, Shingrix keeps it 100
author: Kevin Dunleavy
description: In October of last year, GSK laid out a plan to double its business in China by 2025, with much of that expansion dependent upon the succe | In October of last year, GSK laid out a plan to double its business in China by 2025, with much of that expansion dependent upon the success of shingles vaccine Shingrix. On Wednesday, GSK left little doubt about the benefit of Shingrix as it reported 100% efficacy from a post-licensing trial of the shot.
